Description:
Terrace with a Modern edge
This spacious renovated Victorian offers generous accommodation including 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, Large open planning living area overlooking a courtyard garden, garaging and a separate studio comprising 1 bedroom and a bathroom. Presented in good condition located close to Smith St, Brunswick St and the Fitzroy pool this property is a must see.
Insights: 60 Alexandra Parade, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Auction This Saturday At 1.30pm, View From 1.10pm
3 Bedroom Period Family Home on 282m2
This absolute charmer will give a family the opportunity of buying into the area on a more modest price range than most double fronted homes. Let’s cover two aspects first – it was never part of the tunnel project and a new development is proposed across the street. Ask for a copy of the projections.
Immediately livable with high decorative ceilings, open fire places, polished boards and a fresh neutral décor allows immediate occupation with 3-4 bedrooms, lounge, modern kitchen with meals and bathroom with euro laundry.
Potential abounds with its large rear garden which can accommodate further extensions or plan to go up if more room is needed. Make the effort to visit as you’ll be pleased by your discoveries.
Insights: 57 Alexander Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Auction This Saturday At 11am, View From 10.40am
Executors Auction
This spacious top floor two bedroom apartment has a delightful northerly aspect filtering natural light throughout. Positioned at the rear of the block with security entry the apartment is in sound condition and ready for occupation but has potential for renovations.
Enter through a spacious lounge to adjoining kitchen with meals area, an open plan could be developed plus two genuine double bedrooms with robes and a large bathroom with laundry facilities.
An under cover car space is included and a location most enviable on the Capitol Trail along the Merri Creek and Yarra. So if it’s a quiet lifestyle you seek whilst being in the heart of the inner city amenity, look no further.
Insights: 8/32 The Esplanade, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
A great place to live...
In a handsome period home, in comfortable order plenty of scope to improve in time. There are 2 bedrooms, lounge, kitchen, bathroom and a deep rear garden to ROW, all located in a quiet street surrounded by fantastic facilities, Clifton Hill shops, a great school and with direct access to Collingwood and the CBD beyond this is an ideal inner city home.

Description:
Village Delight With Large Courtyard & Car Access
The perfect entry point for fabulous future inner-city entertaining, this attractive freestanding Victorian has much more outdoor space than most similar opportunities. Nestled on a quiet Clifton Hill Village street, this elegant solid brick home with excellent ROW and rear roller door vehicle access is ideally placed for you to immediately enjoy its impressive proportions, fine features and proximity to cafes, shops, schools, Yarra parklands, Darling Gardens and train station. Further improve adding value when ready with some stylish contemporary enhancement. Includes arched hallway, two spacious bedrooms (main with marble fireplace and BIRs), generous living room, kitchen and meals area, bright bathroom, laundry, gas and panel heating, evaporative cooling, alarm system, polished Baltic pine floorboards, high original heritage ceilings, OFPs and sun-filled alfresco entertainment area.
Insights: 21 Gordon Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Outstanding modern living with view to the city
Contemporary quality shines with the bright modern spaces, natural light and elegant detail throughout this outstanding balcony residence at the heart of the Clifton Hill Village. Flanked by superb upper-level city views and a striking rear alfresco oasis; excellent 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom accommodation is beautifully complemented by stylish up-to-date enhancement to enjoy in peaceful privacy surrounded by Yarra River parkland/trails, cafes, schools and train station. This immaculate modern home includes main bedroom with stunning ensuite, attractive living room (gas log heater), large dining area overlooking light court, brilliant stone kitchen (Smeg stove, Bosch dishwasher), powder room, laundry, reverse-cycle heating/cooling, alarm, polished floorboards and secluded landscaped entertainment terrace.
Insights: 34 Fenwick Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
"CLIFTON VILLA"
Victorian elegance meets cutting-edge style; this captivating double-front terrace delivers a luxurious city-edge family lifestyle with its extended floorplan, first-class renovations and enviably convenient location. Meticulous attention to detail, the home's stunning interior boasts four large bedrooms (master with WIR and ensuite), opulent main bathroom and additional powder room (third WC), expansive open-plan living/dining area enhanced by a gourmet stone-top kitchen with breakfast bar, soft-close drawers, Bosch appliances and ample cupboard space. Add to this a built-in study alcove, hydronic heating and split-system a/c, towering ceilings, polished floorboards, double-glazed windows, excellent storage spaces and more, plus al-fresco entertaining deck, private back garden and secure off-street parking option via rear ROW. Stroll to Queens Parade trams, cool cafes and boutique shops, primary and secondary schools, Clifton Hill Station as well as the delightful environs of both Darling Gardens and Edinburgh Gardens. Exceptional living, perfect position! Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 472 Wellington Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Contemporary style on the park
In a leafy Clifton Hill pocket moments from Merri Creek trails and acres of parkland, this distinctive 3-storey home presents an outstanding city-edge lifestyle or blue-chip investment opportunity. Light-filled interior showcases 3 genuinely large bedrooms (all with robes), 2-way main bathroom and additional powder room (second WC), spacious lounge and living/dining areas complemented by a central kitchen with breakfast bar and dishwasher. Add to this gas heating, new carpets and floors, plus a sizeable north-facing back garden complete with secure carport to ROW. Also close to Dights Falls and Yarra River/Capital City Trail, Yarra Bend Park, public transport options (trains, buses and trams) as well as some of inner-Melbourne's favourite cafe/shopping precincts.
Insights: 201 Roseneath Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Timeless Edwardian With Impressive Renovation
Rarely does a home boast such a seamless blend of elegant period allure with an impressive contemporary finish, as is the case with this truly exceptional family home. Beyond its captivating street presence with wrought iron fence, tessellated tile entrance and tuck-pointed-brick Edwardian façade, the generously proportioned and light-filled interior comprises an expansive open plan extension with well-appointed kitchen (stone bench tops, integrated Miele dishwasher and AGA industrial oven) overlooking the dining and living zones that flow into to the north-facing outdoor deck and tremendous established rear garden oasis with fragrant citrus trees and outdoor shed, large formal sitting room, 4 bedrooms with BIRs, home office/library (B/I desk and bookshelves), upstairs retreat, both storeys with a central bathroom and powder room, storage room/wine closet, separate laundry with linen press and roof storage. Surrounded by attractive period homes, the location enjoys an idyllic family lifestyle with Yarra Bend Parklands at the end of the street and is just a short stroll to Westgarth Village cafes and cinema, Clifton Hill train station, Queens Parade and Smith Street shops and trams, Edinburgh Gardens, Fitzroy North Village and a number of excellent schools. Features include high ceilings and polished timber floors throughout, original OFPs, hydronic heating and air-conditioning. Land size 600m2 approx.
Insights: 100 Spensley Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 1 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Parkside living: superior design and generous space
This elegant masterbuilt residence, designed for low-maintenance living in an exclusive precinct adjoining Yarra parkland and close to schools, Village cafes and station, will appeal to both families and those seeking to downsize. With a versatile, superbly zoned floor plan, inverted to capture natural light, it comprises a vast living/dining room with raked ceiling and balcony; bespoke kitchen (stone benchtops, premium appliances and pantry); three well-separated double bedrooms, two with stylish ensuites; sunny study alcove, and luxurious 3rd family bathroom/laundry with overbath shower. Including a remote-entry garage, climate-controlled wine room, expansive rear courtyard and balconies, this impressive home features premium appointments, generous custom storage throughout, reverse-cycle air conditioning and gas heating.
Insights: 1 Park Drive, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Inner City Sophisticate With Roof Top Entertaining
A pretty Victorian facade reveals little of the chic contemporary interiors that define this renovated brick Victorian, perfectly positioned to embrace a rewarding inner-city lifestyle. Once across its bluestone threshold, glossy hardwood floors, cleverly placed downlights and crisp white washed walls set a sophisticated, architectural tone in a modern single fronted layout that culminates in a brilliant rooftop entertaining domain featuring City views and decked seating. Two spacious double bedrooms retain their high ceilings, one with BIR, the main now with private outdoor deck, fabulous WIR featuring his and hers storage and ensuite access to a designer bathroom with rain shower. Polished concrete floors emphasise the size and space provided by an open plan living/dining domain with built in media storage and superb entertainers kitchen with deep stone benchtops, top performing smeg appliances and a walk in pantry. Floor to ceiling bifold doors draw back to a feature planted courtyard and incredible floating staircase to the sky-high delight above. Includes hydronic subfloor heating, split cooling, rear pedestrian access via ROW.
Insights: 36 Rutland Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Renovate & Reap The Rewards
At O'Grady Street's wider preferred end, a number of outstanding elements establish an exciting foundation for this Victorian's contemporary renaissance. Requiring restoration/renovation (STCA) behind its enchanting Hawthorn brick facade, its incredible 306sqm (approx.) parcel with broad frontage and dual access via George Street, evocative period personality and easy proximity to the Village would suggest that all 'the bones' are here for inner city success. A wide arched hallway links three double bedrooms, all with open fireplaces, to an open plan 1980's kitchen and charming living/dining zones, also with open fireplace and a northern window provides abundant natural light. Other highlights include soaring ceilings, original bluestone foundations and timber floors, hydronic heating, reverse cycle air-conditioner, large picturesque cottage garden with mature fruit trees and garage with additional storage. Within easy walking distance to Clifton Hill station, village shops and acres of Yarra River-Merri Creek parkland and trails.
Insights: 43 O'Grady Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Address: 1/264 Alexandra Parade East Clifton Hill VIC 3068
Description:
Low maintenance Inner city Living
Situated on the 1st floor, this modern and spacious apartment is conveniently situated close to Yarra Bend & Dights Falls, Queens Parade shopping strip, parklands, transport and easy access to Eastern Freeway. The stylish accommodation includes one bedroom with built in robe, central bathroom with combined laundry, gourmet open plan kitchen including stainless steel appliances, gas cooking, dishwasher and stone bench tops with adjacent living/dining zones leading to a private undercover terrace. Other important features include remote control lock up garage and secure storage room (both on title), split system heating/cooling, video intercom and security entrance - all adding further appeal. This property offers an affordable, low maintenance lifestyle and is sure to impress 1st home buyers, those searching for a city pad or smart inner city investment. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd.
Insights: 1/264 Alexandra Parade East, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 12 other 1 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Ideal Start To Inner City Success
A fabulous opportunity in the vibrant inner city. This charming Victorian combines originally renovated comfort with an exciting address in a thriving location. Quiet, private and beautifully bright, its spacious proportions will provide a comfortable home for the owner occupier or an astute investment opportunity. A range of city edge rewards including Darling and Edinburgh Gardens, the cafes of Smith Street, Brunswick Street and Queens Parade, primary and secondary schools, trams, trains and buses are all within walking distance. Behind its single-fronted brick facade, two generous bedrooms precede a sizeable central bathroom with solar hot water and laundry facilities before a fully equipped kitchen. The rear of the home has an expansive light filled dining and living area, flowing out to a secluded garden courtyard with shed and side and rear ROW. With timber floors, high ceilings, and scope to add value if desired. (STCA).
Insights: 20 Hilton Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Stylish Parkside Living with Secure Parking
A creative contemporary take on townhouse living, this dual level residence combines designer luxury with urban style to create an upmarket inner city retreat and superb entertainer. Tucked away in a quiet pocket just a short stroll to Dights Falls, the Merri Creek and Yarra River bike trails, cafes, freeway access, Clifton Hill Station, trams and buses. With its own entrance, immaculate presentation, light filled interiors throughout, soaring ceilings and generous proportions it is a haven of low maintenance sophistication. The downstairs domain comprises of a double bedroom with under-stair storage and ensuite whilst upstairs showcases an expansive open plan living and dining, Smeg equipped kitchen with dishwasher, spacious bedroom with built in robes, stylish central bathroom with oversized shower plus a fully fitted European laundry. Additions such as Nobo panel heating in the bedrooms, split system heating/cooling upstairs, ample storage and a secure basement carspace demonstrate meticulous attention to detail.
Insights: 12 Stan Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Warehouse style With A Village Vibe
From its unassuming facade, you'd never realise this two bedroom townhouse offered so much in terms of lifestyle so close to the CBD. On its own title and in the heart of Clifton Hill Village, its' stylish, spacious proportions offer a beautifully quiet lock up and leave environment that's enhanced by absolute privacy, two secluded outdoor zones, remote garaging and of course, a position that places cafes, trains, parkland and even the CBD all within moments. Impeccably maintained and updated by only the one owner since construction, this secret inner city oasis provides light filled accommodation that includes open plan living with landscaped courtyard, recently renovated designer kitchen with European appliances and stone benchtops, two upstairs bedrooms with extensive robes, the generous main with sun terrace, a full-size bathroom, downstairs powder room, European laundry, Velux sky windows, split heating/cooling and polished timber floors.

Description:
Stunning Renovated Apartment, Opposite Parklands!
Enjoying one of Clifton Hill's most highly sought-after parkland positions, this stunning ground floor apartment with an exceptional address is brimming with lifestyle bonuses featuring parklands, Fairfield Boathouse, bike and walking tracks, Yarra Bend Golf Course, Sporting clubs and lots more!.
This wonderful apartment offers 2 double bedrooms with built-in robes, spacious living/dining area leading out to its own balcony, a beautifully renovated kitchen, lovely bathroom, laundry taps, and lots more! The property features lovely engineered timber floor boards, porcelain tiles, under bench oven hot plates and dishwasher, wall to wall carpets in bedrooms, heater in living area and lots of storage space!
This brilliant low-maintenance first home or investment property presents a wonderful inner-city lifestyle opportunity with trendy cafes, Queens Parade and Clifton Hill Train Station nearby.
Don`t miss out on this wonderful opportunity!
Insights: 7/16 The Esplanade, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Sophisticated City Edge Or Smart Investment
SOLD by Miles Real Estate. Inner city convenience enjoys a distinctly village vibe in this sophisticated tri level town residence positioned just a short walk from gorgeous Clifton Hill Village, Queens Parade shopping, Darling Gardens and Clifton Hill Station. Enhanced by the peace and privacy of its own street entry, smartly presented proportions rise up to top floor living and entertaining spaces where a granite topped kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a beautifully broad alfresco terrace ensure outstanding indoor/outdoor entertaining flexibility. Two spacious double bedrooms with sizeable built in robes share a stylishly updated family bathroom with bath and separate shower, study nook and cleverly placed internal light atrium. Includes ducted heating/cooling, secure entry, undercover garage parking with internal access. Only minutes to the CBD, Collingwood Leisure Centre, parkland and Merri Creek trails and inner city attractions. Currently leased month to month returning $1,999 pcm and can be offered with vacant possession.
Insights: 51 John Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Contemporary Excellence Personified
Beyond its alluring, elevated block-fronted Victorian façade, this impeccably renovated home exceeds all expectations with its tasteful use of industrial and contemporary materials and impressive design maximising the utilisation of space with custom cabinetry throughout. Boasting an aesthetic continuity with clean lines and neutral tones, the light-filled interior comprises 3 bedrooms with BIRs (upstairs main with ensuite), an expansive open plan living room with designer kitchen (marble bench tops, Bosch/Neff appliances, stainless steel splashback), polished concrete floor and wood fire opening onto the sun-drenched north facing courtyard and low-maintenance garden (ROW), study with B/I desk and ceiling-high bookshelf with charming library-style ladder, upstairs retreat or flexible 4th BR, gleaming central bathroom (marble vanity, floor-to-ceiling tiles, linen press), separate laundry and roof storage. Situated in a quiet, family oriented position with Ramsden Street Reserve and Merri Creek Trail at the end of the street, the home enjoys easy access to Clifton Hill train station, nearby cafes, Abbotsford Convent and many fine schools. Features include timber floors, hydronic heating, air-conditioning and ceiling fans.
Insights: 117 Roseneath Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
An exceptional townhouse: seclusion, style and space
This fully renovated, light-filled residence offers quiet and private living in a well-maintained small development bordering Clifton Hill Village and Station, close to schools and Yarra parkland. Entered from an expansive al fresco entertaining courtyard, it comprises a stunning living room with semi-glazed ceiling, adjoining a sunny dining area and new kitchen with stone benchtops and Bosch appliances; three double bedrooms (main with new ensuite and two walls of BIRs) plus study zone; and new central bathroom and euro laundry. Including a LU garage, this inviting home features polished timber floors and new carpets, ducted heating, split-system air conditioning and generous storage.
Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 6/1 Marshall Place, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Factory conversion elegance, park-edge position
Built behind the parapet of the heritage Spicer factory building, this impressive apartment in a well-maintained complex of only 13 offers secure and private living bordering hectares of Yarra parkland and bike trails, and close to Clifton Hill station, cafes and freeway access. Opening to a northerly terrace, it comprises 2 double bedrooms (BIRs, ensuite to main), a spacious living/dining room, stylish Smeg-equipped kitchen and a good-sized bathroom/laundry with walk-in shower. Including basement parking and a storage cage, this immaculate city-edge home features polished timber floors, split-system air conditioning and intercom entry.
Insights: 11/165 Noone Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.
